data.text: ♪ I see what's happening, yeah ♪

data.text: ♪ You're face to face with greatness, and it's strange ♪

data.text: ♪ You don't even know how you feel ♪

data.text: ♪ I could explain every natural phenomenon ♪

data.text: ♪ The tide? The grass? The ground? ♪

data.text: ♪ I killed a snake, I buried its guts ♪

data.text: ♪ Sprouted a tree, now you got coconuts ♪
